sentences.en: ...an exhibition of expressionist art.
sentences.cn: …一场印象主义艺术展览会。

sentences.en: A collection of paintings by David Hockney is on exhibition at the Museum of Art.
sentences.cn: 大卫·霍克尼的一批绘画作品正在美术馆展出。

sentences.en: All visitors to the exhibition must report to the main service desk.
sentences.cn: 到展览会参观的人都必须先到总服务台报到。

sentences.en: an exhibition of black and white photographs
sentences.cn: 黑白摄影作品展

sentences.en: Entries will be prominently displayed in the exhibition hall.
sentences.cn: 参赛作品将陈列在展厅显眼的地方。

sentences.en: Five large pieces of the wall are currently on exhibition in London.
sentences.cn: 那堵墙的5块大碎片眼下正在伦敦展出。

sentences.en: I’ve never seen such an exhibition of jealousy.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过如此嫉妒的表现。

sentences.en: Of course there were lots of other interesting things at the exhibition.
sentences.cn: 当然，展览上还有很多其他有趣的展品。

sentences.en: Our country will tie up with another country to host this exhibition.
sentences.cn: 我国将和另外一个国家联合主办这次展览会。

sentences.en: The exhibition comprises 50 oils and watercolours.
sentences.cn: 展览陈列了50幅油画和水彩画。

sentences.en: The exhibition hall reared above me behind a high fence.
sentences.cn: 高高的围墙后面，展览大厅耸立在我面前。

sentences.en: The exhibition is an enjoyable and, ultimately, life-affirming experience.
sentences.cn: 这个展览是一次不但令人愉快，而且还鼓舞人心的体验。

sentences.en: The exhibition is hardly a crowd-puller.
sentences.cn: 该展览谈不上吸引人。

sentences.en: The exhibition is held annually.
sentences.cn: 这个展览每年举行一次。

sentences.en: The exhibition is organised chronologically.
sentences.cn: 展览是按年代先后布置的。

sentences.en: The gallery has mounted an exhibition of art by Irish women painters.
sentences.cn: 画廊已举办了一场爱尔兰女画家的作品展。

sentences.en: The Hayward exhibition has been curated by the artist Bernard Luthi.
sentences.cn: 海沃德艺术展是由艺术家伯纳德·吕蒂组织的。

sentences.en: The museum will have a permanent exhibition of 60 vintage cars.
sentences.cn: 这个博物馆将长期展出60辆老爷车。

sentences.en: They ceremoniously cut a piece of ribbon, declaring the exhibition open.
sentences.cn: 他们郑重其事地剪彩，宣布展览开幕。

sentences.en: They honoured him with a retrospective exhibition in 1987.
sentences.cn: 他们在1987年为他举办了一次回顾展，以示敬意。

sentences.en: This volume of essays was designed to accompany an exhibition in Cologne.
sentences.cn: 这本文集是为配合在科隆举办的一场展览而出的。

sentences.en: You go to the exhibition centre, I must hie myself to tell the new matters.
sentences.cn: 你去展览中心吧，我得赶紧汇报一下这个新情况。
